categories: Category:Battles of the Great Galactic War

nodes.text: The Battle of Sullust was a conflict during the Great Galactic War between the Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic. The criminal Nok Drayen betrayed the Republic forces on the planet to the Empire, resulting in the capture of the legendary Jedi Ako Domi as well as other Republic soldiers, with the captives being imprisoned in the prison district of Shadow Town on Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War. Years after the battle, scavengers were still coming to reap the spoils.
